titleStmt.title: A Scotch song sung at Tunbridge set to musick by Mr. Ackroyd.
titleStmt.author: Akeroyde, Samuel, ca. 1650-ca. 1706.

publicationStmt.publisher: And exactly engrav'd by Tho: Cross.,
